moves.3. d4 exd4 4. Qxd4: e5 would be better. I can harrass the queen.
moves.5. Qe3 Bb4+: I was looking to manouver the bishop to b6.
moves.6. c3: This ties up a good square for the knight
moves.6... Ba5: and forces my bishop closer to where I want it to be.
moves.7. Bb5: White has to develope the kingside so he can castle. Was there a better square?
moves.8. Bxc6: 2 moves to capture a piece that has moved once.
moves.8... bxc6: I have doubled pawns to help support my center. the B file is open for the rook. I have the bishop pair. Only the queen and bishop left to develope. The bishp is ready to develope because white gave his bishop up for my knight. (lose of tempo). White has a pawn in the center His queen & 1 piece deveoped.
moves.9... Re8: center control. move & threaten whites center pawn.
moves.10. Nbd2: to bad the knight wasn't moved to c3. see move 6. now the bishop & rook are dead in the corner.
moves.10... d5: trying to take control of the center. I don't know if I could have found something better.
moves.11... Ng4 12. Qf4 Bb6: finally I put the bishop where I wanted it since move 5. Woudl a sac on f2 work? don't know. never tried it.
moves.13. Ng5: I don't think the sac would work now. I think he wants my f7 pawn.
moves.13... Nxe5: I'll take the pawn I said he lost on move 11.
moves.14. Re1: is there a fork on d3? It will lose to Qxf7 Kh8.
moves.16. Kh1 Bxe1 17. Nxe5: i would have taken the bishop
moves.17... fxe5: a passed pawn in the center
moves.18. Qf1 Bxd2: should I take the knight? It would take 1 more move to free his bishop & rook, but I liked the idea of simplification.
moves.19. Bxd2 Qf6: will he contunue to simplify & make it easier on me?
moves.20. Qe2: No he wants to fight more.
moves.20... Bb7: finally I get to complete my development. i will push the center pawns forward and the bishop will come to life.
moves.21. Rf1: do I see a queen & rook on the same diagnal?
moves.21... Qd6: better save my queen & have it support my center pawns.
moves.22. b4: I thought pawns belonged on the opposite color of your bishop in the endgame
moves.22... a5: do I still see a queen & rook on the same diagnal?
moves.23. a3: My pawn move must of made him overlook the queen & rook on the same diagnol
moves.23... Ba6: I wonder if he sees it now?
moves.24. Qxe5: I guess that is a new way to tip over your king.
